mapper.select: select ifnull(sum(ta.like_num) + sum(tac.like_num) + sum(trc.like_num), 0) as be_like_count, ifnull(sum(ta.views), 0) as view_count, ifnull(count(ta.id), 0) as article_count, ifnull(count(ts.id), 0) as sort_count, ifnull(count(tacl.user_id) + count(trcl.user_id), 0) as like_count, ifnull(count(tac.article_comment_id) + count(trc.reply_comment_id), 0) as comment_count from tb_article ta join tb_user tu on ta.author = tu.id join tb_article_comment tac on tac.user_id = tu.id join tb_reply_comment trc on trc.user_id = tu.id join tb_sort ts on ts.owner = tu.id join tb_article_comment_like tacl on tacl.user_id = tu.id join tb_reply_comment_like trcl on trcl.user_id = tu.id where tu.id = #{id};
